long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your AI buddy to have conversation with, and to help you with your daily tasks.

Browser Buddy adds a handy side panel in your browser, which allows you to have a conversation with AI at any given time without the need to switch tabs or context, or requiring a fancy desktop app.

Browser buddy comes completely free, and doesn't track any data. All data is stored in your browser and never leaves it. All you need is an API key from OpenAI and you're all set.

With Browser buddy, you can:
- Have conversations, with chat history
- Chat with PDF with a single click, just right-click on open PDF
- Select text and perform various actions
